channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: How Amazon’s New ‘Batman’ Cartoon Spotlights the Wayne Family’s Antics
item.description: Executive producer and showrunner Mike Roth talks about the DC Studios animated show 'Bat-Fam,' now streaming on Prime Video.

item.title: VC Jennifer Neundorfer explains how founders can stand out in a crowded AI market
item.description: January Ventures co-founder Jennifer Neundorfer discussed this AI-driving funding market on the Equity podcast during TechCrunch Disrupt.

item.title: Elon Musk Tries Desperately to Prove He’s a Real Human Being
item.description: The world's richest man has created a fake world for himself.

item.title: Single Day AliExpress : les meilleures offres high-tech sont là, mais pas pour longtemps [Sponso]
item.description: Connaissez-vous le Single Day ? Venue de Chine, cette fête propulsée en France par AliExpress est une occasion rêvée pour faire le plein de bonnes affaires. Découvrez les meilleurs bons plans tech de cette journée devenue iconique.

item.title: What is the Dyson Airwrap Co-anda 2x and how is it better than the Airwrap?
item.description: Is Dyson's shiny – and pricey – new styler worth splashing out on? Here's everything you need to know.

item.title: Apple's rumored 'Health+' subscription tier with AI features is doomed to repeat Garmin's failure
item.description: Garmin’s Connect+ app was heavily panned during launch, with many users seeing it as a slippery slope.

item.title: Le Black Friday chinois démarre fort : voici le TOP 10 des meilleures offres du 11 novembre sur AliExpress et consorts
item.description: Le 11 novembre, c'est le 11.11, ou Single Day. Voyez le un peu comme le Black Friday chinois où il est possible de faire d'excellentes affaires sur de nombreux produits Tech populaires. Dans cet article, nous vous partageons les meilleures offres sélectionnées par la rédaction.

item.title: Siri Shortcuts now works with Samsung SmartThings routines
item.description: Samsung’s latest SmartThings update adds support for Siri Shortcuts. In a press release, Samsung announced that you can now use Siri to run SmartThings routines, allowing you to use Apple’s voice assistant to control your smart home. Siri Shortcuts is a feature in iOS that lets you run automations by asking Siri. These can either […]

item.title: Edgar Wright on ‘The Running Man’ Gift He Gave Stephen King and the Race to Finish the Film
item.description: Glen Powell stars in the King adaptation from the 'Hot Fuzz' director, in theaters November 14.

item.title: Apple TV Isn’t Interested in Ads or Buying Warner Bros. Discovery—Yet
item.description: Senior Vice President of Apple Services Eddy Cue says it's better for consumers 'not to get interrupted with ads.'

item.title: Forget AI, Microsoft is working on "superintelligence" - with medical diagnosis the first area of interest
item.description: Microsoft’s Humanist Superintelligence seeks to create controllable AI enhancing medicine, education, and sustainability.

item.title: The best early Black Friday deals we’ve found so far on laptops, TVs, and more
item.description: Black Friday is the most anticipated day of the year for bargain hunters. While there’s still some time to go before November 28th, we’re already starting to see a selection of early discounts, allowing you to get a jump on your holiday shopping. Right now, for instance, you can get nearly 50 percent off select […]

item.title: Paramount Plus is getting a price hike in early 2026
item.description: Paramount Plus is going up in price again. As part of its earnings report released on Monday, Paramount announced that it will raise prices for subscribers in the US on January 15th, 2026, bringing the ad-supported Essential plan from $7.99 to $8.99 per month, while the ad-free Premium plan will go from $12.99 to $13.99 […]

item.title: European Countries Probing ‘Security Loophole’ in China-Made Electric Buses
item.description: Norway, Denmark, and the UK are investigating buses from China’s Yutong over fears they could be disabled remotely.

item.title: The Strange Price Some Men Pay After Donating a Kidney? Swollen Balls
item.description: Research finds that many living male kidney donors will need surgery to treat their swollen scrotums.

item.title: ‘V for Vendetta’ Is Becoming a TV Show
item.description: DC Studios will produce a new adaptation of the classic comic for HBO.

item.title: Nintendo’s upcoming Black Friday sale includes up to $30 off Switch classics
item.description: Nintendo rarely offers big discounts on its own games and gear throughout the year, but opportunities to save are coming soon. The company announced that multiple retailers will offer discounts of up to $30 off of beloved Switch games, as well as temporary price cuts on its amiibo figures, and a $20 off discount on […]

item.title: Palm Royale stars call the series ‘Hitchcock meets Bewitched’ ahead of suspenseful season 2 premiere
item.description: Palm Royale cast reveal why the show is like "if Big Little Lies and Bridesmaids had a baby" and what season 2 has in store.

item.title: 50 Black Friday Target deals: Early shoppers save big on TVs, air fryers, streaming sticks, and headphones
item.description: Target's early Black Friday deals and doorbusters include big savings on Bose speakers, Beats headphones, Keurig coffee makers, and TCL TVs.

item.title: How to watch Monday Night Football without starting a new live TV trial: The $5 Sling TV day pass hack
item.description: YouTube TV subscribers looking to watch the Eagles-Packers game can buy a 24-hour pass to ESPN for $4.99 from Sling TV.

item.title: The best doorbell cameras
item.description: With a smart video doorbell, your front door’s communication skills go from 1980s landline to a modern smartphone. Combining a motion-activated camera with a microphone, speaker, and buzzer, a doorbell camera sends alerts to your phone, allowing you to see who’s at the door without needing to open it or even be at home. Whether […]

item.title: Here’s how American Airlines plans to bounce back after the shutdown chaos
item.description: Even with a deal to end the shutdown on the horizon, no one’s breathing easy yet. When the head of schedule planning at American Airlines, Jay Gargas, stepped off the plane in Dallas-Fort Worth after an 18-hour journey from Istanbul last Wednesday, he faced chaos.

item.title: Warren Buffett warns ‘Father Time’ is catching up and reflects on his life in a letter to shareholders
item.description: Buffett also reassured shareholders that he remains confident in his successor, Greg Abel. Billionaire Warren Buffett warned shareholders Monday that many companies will fare better than his Berkshire Hathaway in the decades ahead because of its massive size, though others might say the company’s prospects will dim because “Father Time” is catching up with the 95-year-old icon who plans to step down as CEO in January....

item.title: Meta’s AI Ambitions Appear to Be in a Tailspin
item.description: Turns out investors aren't huge on spending money with no returns.
